message: In the SNP, it says that you won't automatically post updates on your users' behalf. Awesome! But in order to connect my FB or Twitter accounts here, you require me to grant you permission to post updates on your behalf. I want to connect Convore to my FB and Twitter accounts, but I don't want to grant it read-write privileges. Why can't I do this?
I am pretty sure thru the apis that you can't just get read and not write it is the Facebook and twitter APIs
con ore needs permission to post for when you click in the "share this group" buttons. it will nit post unless you do that.
Sure—they can go through the OAuth dance again, the first time I do that, to get r/w perms.
